message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you this exclusive opportunity to purchase a unique product. With 1 out of 3 products being high-quality, the odds are in your favor. I'm confident that you'll love this product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. What do you say? Will you take the chance?

Ahaha, great question! I have 20 products in stock, and 7 of them have been sold so far. That means there are 13 products left, including this one.
